CLINICAL LABORATORY REPORT

Patient: John Doe
Date: 2024-02-20

VITAL SIGNS:
Blood Pressure: 180/95 mmHg
Heart Rate: 85 bpm
Temperature: 98.6°F

BLOOD CHEMISTRY:
Blood Glucose: 250 mg/dL
Total Cholesterol: 240 mg/dL
LDL Cholesterol: 160 mg/dL
HDL Cholesterol: 35 mg/dL
Triglycerides: 200 mg/dL

HEMATOLOGY:
Hemoglobin: 11.5 g/dL
WBC: 12.5 ×10³/μL
Platelet Count: 180 ×10³/μL

KIDNEY FUNCTION:
Creatinine: 1.5 mg/dL
BUN: 25 mg/dL

NOTES:
Multiple parameters outside normal range. Patient advised to follow up with primary care physician.
